mapper.select:
SELECT III.item_number, CONCAT(IIC.brand, " ", IIC.name) as name, III.code_ingredient, III.quantity, III.unit_price, CU.name, III.code_unit, III.stock_date FROM
MO.IM_INGREDIENT_INVENTORY III JOIN MO.IM_INGREDIENT_CODE IIC ON III.code_ingredient = IIC.code
JOIN CORE_UNITS CU ON III.code_unit = CU.code_unit
WHERE III.code_ingredient = #{codeIngredient}

SELECT IIP.item_number, CONCAT(IIC.brand, " ", IIC.name) as name, IIP.code_ingredient, IIP.quantity, IIP.unit_price, CU.name, IIP.code_unit, IIP.total_price, IIP.order_date FROM IM_INGREDIENT_PENDING IIP JOIN IM_INGREDIENT_CODE IIC ON IIP.code_ingredient = IIC.code
JOIN CORE_UNITS CU ON IIP.code_unit = CU.code_unit
mapper.insert: insert into IM_INGREDIENT_PENDING( create_date, update_date, update_user, update_program, code_ingredient, quantity, unit_price, code_unit, total_price, order_date) values ( sysdate(), sysdate(), "pgm", "IPService", #{codeIngredient}, #{quantity}, #{unitPrice}, #{unitCode}, #{totalPrice}, #{date})

insert into IM_INGREDIENT_INVENTORY( create_date, update_date, update_user, update_program, code_ingredient, quantity, total_price, code_unit, unit_price, stock_date, roast_date) values ( sysdate(), sysdate(), "pgm", "IPService", #{codeIngredient}, #{quantity}, #{totalPrice}, #{unitCode}, #{unitPrice}, sysdate(), #{roastDate})

insert into IM_INGREDIENT_PENDING_HIST( create_date, update_date, update_user, update_program, code_ingredient, quantity, unit_price, code_unit, total_price, order_date, delivery_date) values ( sysdate(), sysdate(), "pgm", "IPService", #{codeIngredient}, #{quantity}, #{unitPrice}, #{unitCode}, #{totalPrice}, #{date}, sysdate())
